participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan.

participant_2.background: i do not like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i'm in college to become a nurse.

content.text: i'm in college to become a nurse
